mapper.insert: insert into cart_table(memberId, productId, productName, productPrice, productCount, productFileName) values (#{memberId}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productCount}, #{productFileName})
mapper.select: select count(*) from cart_table where memberId=#{memberId} and productId=#{productId}
update cart_table set productCount = productCount + #{productCount} where memberId=#{memberId} and productId=#{productId}
